title: Summer Vacation for Good Girls
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>Phew, that was tiring~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Are we stopping here for today?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Yeah. We’re a bit further than where I planned for today.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>At this rate, we’ll be done with our summer homework in no time~! Then we can have lots of fun and practice without having to worry about it, zura!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Now that we know that working together helps us finish faster, tomorrow I’ll invite Yoshiko-chan too. I want to ask her about some things I don’t understand…<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>It sounds like Yoshiko-chan’s surprisingly ahead of us.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Yeah! And if we all get our homework done soon, we can spend the rest of summer vacation having lots of fun!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru wants to light some fireworks, zura~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>I want to go to a summer festival, and to visit Tokyo!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Thinking of all the fun things we could do makes me not want to do my homework anymore, zura... Let’s do our best with Yoshiko-chan tomorrow!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
